alert.note: Alert for Modoc County; Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties; South Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued June 19 at 2:51PM PDT until June 20 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 expected. * WHERE...This includes all valley areas in Klamath, Lake, Modoc and northeastern Sikiyou counties. This includes Silver Lake, Fort Rock, Chemult, Klamath Falls, Keno, Paisley, Valley Falls, and Lakeview. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Modoc County; Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties; South Central Siskiyou County
